ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){
list1=JSON.parse(result).sources[i].details.data;
for(j in list1){
if(list1[j].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>
$.[*]

<js>
var bookId=java.get('bid');
var encryptKey="37e81a9d8f02596e1b895d07c171d5c9",user_id="8000000",timestamp=parseInt((new Date).getTime()/1e3);

</js>
